english: Yasha often envied their unswerving faith .
chinese: 雅夏经常羡慕他们毫不动摇的信仰。
她是不可动摇的，不可理解的，不可捉摸的。

english: He was in no hurry about implementing his unshakable principle .
chinese: 他并不急于实行他那不可动摇的原则。

english: We are vexed by too much inconsistency and vacillation in our creed .
chinese: 我们为了信条中有太多不一致和动摇的地方而感到苦恼。

english: There was much about love in the ballad-faithful love that disaster could not shake .
chinese: 这是一支情歌--歌颂任何灾难不能动摇的忠实的爱。
动摇的造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: Through the long four years of struggle he stood out an inflexible conviction, a steadfast will .
chinese: 在漫长的四年斗争中，他始终坚持一个不动摇的信念，一个坚定不移的意志。

english: After years of pre-conditioning, most of us have developed an unshakable faith in railway timetables .
chinese: 多年先入为主的思想使我们大多数人对火车时刻表产生了不可动摇的信念。

english: The very thought was incredible and it struck at the very foundations of the security of scarlett's life .
chinese: 思嘉莉特觉得这件事断难置信，因为这是要使她的生活从根本上动摇的。

english: With unbroken will, he had stood by his position with regard to her, he had substituted pity for all his hostility .
chinese: 他坚守着这种不可动摇的对她的信念，用怜悯取代他所有的敌意。

english: Don t you ever weaken , huck , and i won t .
chinese: 别动摇呀，哈克，我是不会动摇的。 ”

english: He won a lasting place in the actor ' s hall of fame
chinese: 他在演剧界享有无可动摇的地位。

english: Another step in our unified march
chinese: 我们的统一的进程，又要向永不动摇的目标

english: Another step in our unified march
chinese: 我们的统一的进程，又要向永不动摇的目标

english: He tried to stiffen his wavering soldiers
chinese: 他企图使动摇的士兵坚强起来。

english: I like your song . ' shaking friendship . '
chinese: 我喜欢你的歌“动摇的友谊”
